anomalies.description: Breakthrough in quantum catalysis increases alpha probability

insights.description: Deploy treasury overdrive to capture supply chain arbitrage
Launch quantum expansion thread to scale frontier research
Activate guardian pivot to secure regulatory advantage
Route unstoppable liquidity through DeFi supremacy bridge

routes.description: Deploys jobs to AGI Jobs v0 (v2) marketplace
Rebalances reserves via unstoppable treasury module
Executes guardian quorum adjustments via multisig
Sends ERC-4337 bundles through sponsored paymaster

unstoppable_initiatives: Spin up sovereign mission threads on demand
Stream antifragility probes into guardian council

mermaid.flow:
graph TD
  Owner((Supreme Owner)) --> Identify[Hyper Identify Mesh]
  Identify --> Learn[Open-Ended Curriculum Forge]
  Learn --> Think[Meta-Agentic Tree of Supremacy]
  Think --> Design[Creative Atlas]
  Design --> Strategise[Portfolio Navigator]
  Strategise --> Execute[On-Chain Execution Fabric]
  Execute --> Govern[Guardian Meta-Conductor]
  Govern --> Sustain[Owner Supremacy Matrix]
  Sustain --> Owner
  Owner -->|Override Scripts| Execute
  Owner -->|Parameter Switches| Strategise
  subgraph Supremacy["Supremacy Flywheel"]
    Telemetry((Telemetry))
    Autopilot((Autopilot))
    Treasury((Treasury))
    Guardians((Guardian Mesh))
    CI((CI V2 Grid))
    Gasless((Gasless Fabric))
    Telemetry --> Autopilot
    Autopilot --> Treasury
    Treasury --> Guardians
    Guardians --> CI
    CI --> Gasless
    Gasless --> Execute
  end
  Execute --> Supremacy
  Supremacy --> Execute
mermaid.sequence:
sequenceDiagram
  participant Owner as Supreme Owner
  participant Console as Supremacy Console
  participant Planner as Meta-Agentic Planner
  participant Guardians as Guardian Council
  participant Chain as AGI Jobs v0 (v2)
  participant Treasury as Treasury Autopilot
  Owner->>Console: Launch Supremacy Scenario
  Console->>Planner: Upload V10 scenario YAML
  Planner->>Guardians: Stream unstoppable levers & antifragility checks
  Guardians->>Treasury: Approve hyper-bridge & reserves
  Treasury->>Chain: Simulate 4337 execution + treasury routing
  Chain-->>Console: CI V2 verdicts + receipts + telemetry
  Console-->>Owner: Render supremacy dashboard & override levers
  Owner->>Chain: Optional unstoppable switch execution
mermaid.gantt:
gantt
  title Meta-Agentic Supremacy Timeline
  dateFormat X
  axisFormat %s
  section Identify
    Hyper-signal fusion       :done,    0, 1
    Antifragility anomaly scan:active,  1, 1
  section Learn
    Curriculum escalation     :        2, 1
    World model distillation  :        3, 2
  section Strategise
    Treasury supremacy mesh   :        5, 1
    Guardian quorum sync      :        6, 1
  section Execute
    4337 dry-run envelope     :        7, 1
    On-chain execution        :        8, 1
    Owner override window     :        9, 1
mermaid.mindmap:
mindmap
  root((Meta-Convergence))
    Identify
      Multi-domain feeds
      Alpha anomalies
    Learn
      Curriculum loops
      World model distillation
    Think
      Meta search
      Guardian council
    Design
      Creative forges
      Simulation sweeps
    Strategise
      Treasury dominion
      Governance lattice
    Execute
      4337 account abstraction
      Sovereign overrides
mermaid.journey:
journey
  title Owner Empowerment Journey V10
  section Console
    Launch supremacy CLI: 5: owner
    Review unstoppable dashboard: 5: owner
    Trigger override switch: 5: owner
  section Guardians
    Confirm quorum: 5: guardians
    Approve antifragility probes: 5: guardians
    Endorse unstoppable threshold: 5: guardians
  section Treasury
    Stream hyperliquidity: 4: treasury
    Route cross-chain bridges: 4: treasury
mermaid.state:
stateDiagram-v2
  [*] --> SupremacyReady
  SupremacyReady --> Identify
  Identify --> Learn
  Learn --> Think
  Think --> Design
  Design --> Strategise
  Strategise --> Execute
  Execute --> SupremacyReview
  SupremacyReview --> Execute: Override Script
  SupremacyReview --> [*]
mermaid.quadrant:
quadrantChart
  title Supremacy Command Quadrant
  x-axis Automation <---> Human Oversight
  y-axis Passive <---> Proactive
  "Owner Override Mesh" : 0.40 : 0.92
  "Guardian Meta-Mesh" : -0.05 : 0.95
  "CI Enforcement" : 0.68 : 0.72
  "Alpha Factories" : 0.84 : 0.45
  "Autopilot Orchestrators" : 0.60 : 0.82
  "Gasless Fabric" : 0.55 : 0.88

supremacy_controls.label: Treasury Overdrive
supremacy_controls.description: Instantly rebalances capital into unstoppable reserve and alpha factories.

supremacy_controls.label: Guardian Pivot
supremacy_controls.description: Shifts guardian quorum to the antifragility formation on command.

supremacy_controls.label: Curriculum Escalator
supremacy_controls.description: Escalates the open-ended curriculum to the next horizon of difficulty.

supremacy_controls.label: Gasless Boost
supremacy_controls.description: Activates 4337 paymaster top-up and session key rotation.

threads.title: Alpha Forge Expansion
objectives: Spin up three new alpha factories
Deploy guardian oversight for each factory

modes.description: Maintains guardian quorum, rotates primaries, and enforces unstoppable threshold.
Streams capital into alpha factories, reserves, and antifragility buffers.
Synthesises new alpha strategies across finance, supply chain, and biotech.
Evolves the open-ended curriculum using POET-style difficulty escalation.
Bridges opportunities across chains and markets with 4337 execution envelopes.

owner_switches.description: Immediate guardian-triggered pause across all pipelines
Rotates the guardian roster into antifragility formation
Streams reserves into unstoppable alpha execution
Escalates the open-ended curriculum and autopilot difficulty

unstoppable_initiatives: Spin up sovereign mission threads on demand
Stream antifragility probes into guardian council
